attributes.action: Close everything down for an appropriate amount of time amidst Covid19.
attributes.additional_details: Corona Virus is a global emergency and we must take precautions before the worst happen like Italy and Iran.
attributes.background: Close Restaurants, Pubs, Retail shops down to avoid a massive spread of corona virus before it’s too late.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was started, the Government has announced that all restaurants and pubs will close. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-further-measures-on-social-distancing 

If you want all non-essential shops to close, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305290 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
